TopicTitle: I think I just partially broke my neck or something

Articles.Content:
Ok first ik this probably isn't the place to post this but i need help and I'm seriously scared

I was first just stretching when I sudenly felt what almost was like a rip in my neck, then I tilted my head backwards and to the left and I had this were feeling that I can't describe really, and it like just prevented me from doing anything, like all I could think about was that feeling until I managed to tilt my head the other way, and now every time I try to tilt my head that way the same thing happens and even with my head tilted to the right it still does it every minute or so, but i can still move everything else fine, my family doesn't care at all at the moment, and the only help I got was my mom telling me to try putting ice on it which is only making my neck cold at this point, I'm scared I partially broke my neck a little or somrthing, can anyone help me?

must be stiff neck.

does it hurt?
Kinda, I think the best I can describe it as feeling like its being run over by a freight train, but without the pain and stuff, but I've had a stiff neck before and I've never felt this before
I might get some medical assistance; for all we know it could be serious.
When I'm resting my head on something I can move it fine but not when I'm sitting up or anything
Ok I can barely move it at all now,
Keep your neck as straight as possible just in case, if the pain persists then seek medical attention. Better safe then sorry

I can't even hold it straight, it still does it sometimes even when I'm tilting my head to the right, and it feels like its getting worse I'm not going to even think about tilting my head the other way...

I had something similar happen once was a bad sprain or muscle cramp from sleeping on it wrong. The good new is you are not going to die, most likely. The bad news is it will get worse over time. You need to get a hot pack on it asap and keep it there till the muscle works loose.
I wasn't sleeping before it happened and I was only stretching though
How were you strecting? It depends how you were stretching that could of done something like that. Muscle relxant cream around the neck area will help.

This exact thing happened to me while I was getting out of bed the other morning.

Get something hot on it. Electric heating pad or whatever you have for that pourpose.. It's going to hurt pretty bad for a while but it'll heal up fairly quick, from personal experiance. You defiantly didn't break it. You'd know if you broke it

If the pain gets worse or you think it's bad enough, you should probably get to a hospital and actually have it checked out though.

You'd know if you broke it

Considering how he's treated it so far, he probably wouldn't know anything any more if he'd broken it.
Dude, call your medic. Keep calm and don't move a lot.

This happens to me every once and awhile, it's usually caused by fatigue.

Feel around your neck to see if there's any unusual swelling or lumps. If there is THEN i would advise showing your parents and maybe then they would take it seriously.

If it persists tomorrow then i guess i'd get it check out by a Chiropractor, it's cheaper than a Hospital visit.

Apparently this same thing happened to my brother a few months ago, he says its going to get better, but its a miracle that he even cared...

Time to try and play ksp sideways...
Hi, how's the neck today better?

A little, I can hold it straight up again but it still gets the feeling every now and then

Edited May 5, 2013 by Deadpangod3
Ugh the pain is advancing again, I can barely hold my head straight now... going to sleep is going to be a major pain...
Still painful, if it is I would really get some medical assistance.

It's pretty much gone now it only does it a very tiny bit when I turn my head to the left as much as I can

Thanks for helping me guys
